cosc345.AuralLearner.model

Class Grader

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.AuralLearner.model.Grader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    be.tarsos.dsp.pitch.PitchDetectionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntervalExerciseGrader, MelodyExerciseGrader, PitchMatchingExerciseGrader, ScaleExerciseGrader

    public class Grader
extends java.lang.Object
implements be.tarsos.dsp.pitch.PitchDetectionHandler
    The Grader class takes a sequence of notes, gets the user to sing those notes, and gives a grade based on how close what the user's singing was compared to the original sequence of notes.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        private void reset()
        Reset the state of the grader.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Get the user's score for the previously graded session. This should be called after the grader has finished grading for best results.
        Returns:
        a double in the range [0.0, 100.0] that represents the user's score.

      • setCallback

        public void setCallback(Callback callback)
        Set the callback to be called once grading is finished.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to be called after grading is finished.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start grading the user's singing.

      • playNextNote

        private void playNextNote()
        Play each note in the grader's sequence of notes, and record the average frequency that the user sang. When the end of the sequence is reached, finish grading.

      • onNoteDone

        private void onNoteDone()
        Calculate the average frequency the user sang for the last note, and then start

      • onSequenceDone

        private void onSequenceDone()

      • calculateScore

        protected double calculateScore()
        Calculate the user's score by comparing the distance of each note the user sang against the grader's sequence of notes.
        Returns:
        the user's score as a number in the range [0.0, 100.0]

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop grading.

        public java.lang.String getFeedback()
